head.title: Corporate Debt Offerings Planned for the Week

hedline.hl1: Corporate Debt Offerings Planned for the Week

block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
America Online Latin America Inc., Fort Lauderdale, Fla., an initial public offering of 25 million class A shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
America Online Latin America Inc., Fort Lauderdale, Fla., an initial public offering of 25 million class A shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
Benchmark Electronics Inc., Angleton, Tex., 2.3 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
Bruker Daltonics Inc., Billerica, Mass., an initial public offering of 7.5 million shares. UBS Warburg.
California Pizza Kitchen Inc., Los Angeles, 5.3 million shares. BancAmerica Securities.
Calpine Corp., San Jose, Calif., 10 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
Convergent Group Corp., Englewood, Colo., an initial public offering of 6 million shares. Robertson, Stephens & Co.
Crosswave Communications Inc., Tokyo, an initial public offering of 17.4 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Deltagen Inc., Menlo Park, Calif., an initial public offering of 7 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
Digital Insight Corp., Calabasas, Calif., 4 million shares. Morgan Stanley, Dean Witter & Co.

Edison Schools Inc., New York, 5 million class A shares. Merrill Lynch & Co.
Entravision Communications Corp., Santa Monica, Calif., 46 million class A shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette, Credit Suisse First Boston, joint-leads.
eRoom System Technologies Inc., Las Vegas, 1.8 million shares. Donald & Co.
Esperion Therapeutics Inc., Ann Arbor, Mich., an initial public offering of 6 million shares. Robertson, Stephens & Co.
EXE Technologies Inc., Dallas, an initial public offering of 7.25 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette, Salomon Smith Barney, joint-leads.
Genaissance Pharmaceuticals Inc., New Haven, an initial public offering of 6 million shares. Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown.

GlobeSpan Inc., Red Bank, N.J., 5 million shares. Robertson, Stephens & Co., Morgan Stanley, Dean Witter & Co., joint-leads.
Goldman Sachs Group Inc., New York, 40 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Graftech Inc., Lakewood, Ohio, an initial public offering of 5.3 million shares. Credit Suisse First Boston.
H Power Corp., Clifton, N.J., an initial public offering of 7 million shares. Lehman Brothers.
iAsiaWorks Inc., San Mateo, Calif., an initial public offering of 9 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Innovative Solutions & Support Inc., Malvern, Pa., an initial public offering of 3 million shares. Friedman, Billings, Ramsey & Co.
Inspire Pharmaceuticals Inc., Durham, N. C., an initial public offering of 5.5 million shares. Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown.
inTEST Corp., Cherry Hill, N. J., 2 million shares. Needham & Co.
Lantronix Inc., Irvine, Calif., an initial public offering of 9 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Lattice Semiconductor Corp., Hillsboro, Ore., 4 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co., Morgan Stanley, Dean Witter & Co., joint-leads.

Lone Star Technologies Inc., Dallas, 3.8 million shares. Bear, Stearns & Co.
Management Network Group Inc., Overland Park, Kan., 4 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
Microtune Inc., Piano, Tex., an initial public offering of 4 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
MIND C.T.I. Ltd., Yoqneam, Israel, an initial public offering of 4.2 million shares. Lehman Brothers.
Millennium Cell Inc., Eatontown, N. J., an initial public offering of 3.7 million shares. Morgan Keegan.
Nassau Broadcasting Corp., Princeton, N. J., an initial public offering of 12.4 million class A shares. Merrill Lynch & Co.
OPNET Technologies Inc., Washington, an initial public offering of 4 million shares. Morgan Stanley, Dean Witter & Co.
Resonate Inc., Sunnyvale, Calif., an initial public offering of 3 million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Rosetta Inpharmatics Inc., Kirkland, Wash., an initial public offering of 7 million shares. Lehman Brothers.
Semitool Inc., Kalispell, Mont., 4.1 million shares. Bear, Stearns & Co.
SignalSoft Corp., Boulder, Colo., an initial public offering of 4.4 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
